org.hibernate.ogm.cfg.spi

Class DocumentStoreConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.hibernate.ogm.cfg.spi.DocumentStoreConfiguration
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CouchDBConfiguration, MongoDBConfiguration

    public abstract class DocumentStoreConfiguration
extends Object
    Provides access to properties common to different document datastores.
    Author:
    Gunnar Morling
